title: STAT+: Senators raise concerns about TrumpRx in letter to HHS watchdog
description: Senators call for a review of TrumpRx by the Office of Inspector General at the Department of Health and Human Services.
content: Senators call for a review of TrumpRx by the Office of Inspector General at the Department of Health and Human Services.
